test.create_query: CREATE TABLE t_json_1(data JSON) ENGINE = MergeTree ORDER BY tuple()
CREATE TABLE t_json_2(data JSON) ENGINE = MergeTree ORDER BY tuple()
CREATE TABLE t_json_3(data JSON) ENGINE = MergeTree ORDER BY tuple()
test.query: INSERT INTO t_json_1 SELECT materialize('{"k1":1, "k2": "some"}') FROM numbers(200000)
INSERT INTO t_json_2 SELECT '{"col' || toString(number % 100) || '":' || toString(number) || '}' FROM numbers(100000)
INSERT INTO t_json_3 SELECT materialize('{"k1":[{"k2":"aaa","k3":[{"k4":"bbb"},{"k4":"ccc"}]},{"k2":"ddd","k3":[{"k4":"eee"},{"k4":"fff"}]}]}') FROM numbers_mt(100000)
